amendment.description: To provide $1,680,000 to investigate and prosecute unsolved civil rights crimes in a fiscally responsible manner by prioritizing spending.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3243 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 31. Record Vote Number: 363.

Amendment SA 3243 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S12742-12747; text: CR S12742-12743) To provide $1,680,000 to investigate and prosecute unsolved civil rights crimes in a fiscally responsible manner by prioritizing spending.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3243 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 31. Record Vote Number: 363.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3243 proposed by Senator Coburn.
